Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2010 05:34PM PJ_CZNemeth wrote: Â I understand the feeling. Although my mother did not survive her stage 4 IBC her spirit and story live on with me. What we found hardest was the time we had with her was already gone. It's okay to be upset and scared about not knowing but it's your positive thinking and positive attitude that will see you through this the most. The support of your family and the people you have on here. Hang in there.
Posts.Title: not knowing zeeka71 kenzie57
